group_1.textLeft: There certainly was a lot! A literal mountain@of mushrooms!
These Kamihama Shrooms only grow here,@right? Amazing...
Too bad we can't eat 'em today. I'm not sure@I can resist...

group_1.textRight: I'm not going to eat them. They're for my@fashion designs!
I'll use these mushrooms as a motif for@a modern new design.
Ooooooh! My creative juices are boiling up!@I have to go design something, right away!

group_1.textLeft: Still...couldn't you let me have a bite?@Before they go all floppy?

group_1.textRight: ...the will of the Mushroom Gods!@[chara:300101:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:300101:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy][chara:300101:cheek_0][chara:300101:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:300101:lipSynch_1]Only they know!

group_1.textLeft: I know I accepted this part-time job as a @mushroom hunting guide...
But you always have the option of paying @me in food, you know...
[chara:302001:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wah!

group_1.textRight: I feel it... It's 'round here somewhere!

group_1.textLeft: That one part of her hair... It's just@jutting out like that.
(So cool... I wonder what clothes would@complement that hairstyle...)
Oh, she noticed us... [chara:302001:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302001:cheek_0][chara:302001:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:302001:lipSynch_1]Um, um...
Who are you? Do you...need something?
Amnesiac?! A-are you okay?
Right? Why would you be?
And somehow she's still awfully cheerful...
Anyway, what business do you have here,@Kazumi the Amnesiac?
What... Are you kidding?

group_1.textRight: But the top of my hair is reacting to @something here.

group_1.textLeft: Do you mean...the part of your hair that's@sticking out?
Really? What exactly?

group_1.textRight: Like, bad guys... And super scary, gross@vibes...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:302001:effect_ef_adv_01][se:7201_detect_magic]Huh... Oh!
[chara:300101:effect_ef_adv_01][se:7201_detect_magic]I'm picking up a Witch with my Soul Gem,@too!

group_1.textRight: Get out of here! Don't go near that spot!

group_1.textLeft: It's a Labyrinth!
Wait, so Kazumi can see Labyrinths?!
Does that mean?!
Excuse me! Can you maybe...
...do things like this?

group_1.textRight: Whoa! What the heck! Is that some kinda@magic trick? Like instant cosplay?

group_1.textLeft: Cosplay... I mean, that's how it looks to@normal people, I guess...
Hmm... How do I put it...uhh...
Oh, whatever! To put it simply...
...this...is magic.
And, um, [chara:300100:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:300100:motion_100][chara:300100:cheek_0][chara:300100:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:300100:lipSynch_1]we're Magical Girls, so like...we@use magic!
